{{Infobox serial killer |name=Abraão José Bueno |image= |caption= |alt= |birthname=Abraão José Bueno |alias= |birth_date=1977 |birth_place=[[Brazil]] |death_date= |death_place= |cause= |conviction=[[Murder]], [[Attempted murder]] |sentence=110 years of imprisonment |victims=4 |beginyear= |endyear= |country=[[Brazil]] |states= |apprehended= }} '''Abraão José Bueno''' (born 1977) is a [[Brazil|Brazilian]] [[nurse]] and [[serial killer]]. In 2005 he was sentenced to 110 years imprisonment for the murder of four children and the attempted murder of another four.<ref name=Ultimo>[http://ultimosegundo.ig.com.br/brasil/2008/05/16/ex_enfermeiro_que_matou_criancas_em_hospital_do_rio_e_condenado_a_110_anos_1315150.html ''Ex-enfermeiro que matou crianças em hospital do Rio é condenado a 110 anos''] {{webarchive |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20080619095227/http://ultimosegundo.ig.com.br/brasil/2008/05/16/ex_enfermeiro_que_matou_criancas_em_hospital_do_rio_e_condenado_a_110_anos_1315150.html |date=June 19, 2008 }} (in Portuguese)</ref>
==Crimes== Bueno worked as a nurse in the Instituto de Puericultura Martagão Gesteira of the [[Federal University of Rio de Janeiro]] (UFRJ) in [[Rio de Janeiro]], Brazil.<ref name=Ultimo/>
In 2005 Bueno, working in a children's ward, began injecting babies and older children with overdoses of [[sedative]]s, causing them to stop breathing. He would then call medical staff to resuscitate them. In the course of one month up to fifteen children are thought to have been targeted, all between the ages of one and ten.<ref>[https://www.unafiscosaude.org.br/artigos/clippingsaude98.doc ''Monstro de jaleco'']{{dead link|date=October 2016 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }} (in Portuguese)</ref> Many suffered from [[AIDS]] and [[leukaemia]].<ref name=Ibvivavida>[https://www.ibvivavida.org.br/noticias.asp?id=818 ''Preso suspeito de intoxicar crianças''] {{webarchive |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20080622232707/https://www.ibvivavida.org.br/noticias.asp?id=818 |date=June 22, 2008 }} (in Portuguese)</ref>
Bueno was arrested in November 2005. On 15 May 2008<ref>[https://www.clicabrasilia.com.br/portal/noticia.php?IdNoticia=57448 ''Ex-técnico de enfermagem pega 110 anos por matar crianças no Rio'']{{dead link|date=October 2016 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }} (in Portuguese)</ref> he was found guilty by judge Valéria Caldi on four counts of murder and four counts of attempted murder. He was sentenced to 110 years in total.
It is thought that Bueno committed his crimes so that he could be the first to notice a problem with a patient, thereby earning the respect and admiration of his co-workers.<ref name=Ibvivavida/>
